A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a totally bad movie\, but not a great one either. Too many plot lines that go nowhere\, too many twists that retwist\, an angry Luke Skywalker (which basically leads you to believe that Kylo can never be a Jedi)\, Leia using the force in a way we've never seen\, and she's alive at the end which means that since she won't be in IX that she dies somehow off camera. I understand that they're passing the torch\, but not sure it's in a good way.
